channel.title: Minigame help
channel.description:
Hello can somone tell me how to make a minigame? this is what minigame i want:
1. You start at LVL. 1 and when u kill somone u auto teleport to lvl 2 2. like 1. but you teleport to lvl 3
please help me and im sorry for bad spelling.
-Meele

item.title: Minigame help
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

Mod Brandon12111:

Hallo do you have Teamviewer? i can make the code for you.

i send a PM to you. yes i got it

Read full topic

item.title: Minigame help
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Mod Brandon12111:

Hallo do you have Teamviewer? i can make the code for you.

You have everyone in the communitysâ€™ Teamviewer User & pass?

Make a new int that saves to the players file,

public int Minigamelevel = 0;

Now make a boolean isinMinigame with the coords, then in your attack player/kill player add:
if(isinMinigame) {
Minigamelevel++;
}

Read full topic
